duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan the overall design and oversee the development of voice/collaboration platforms.
Develop the strategic IT plan to enable voice and video services delivery through consistent approaches and solutions across all lines of business.
Participate in disaster recovery infrastructure planning, building, and testing.
Define and deliver continuous improvement plans and programs to improve system availability and performance.
Communicate architecture decisions, roadblocks, and timelines to stakeholders.
Comply with all policies and standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a quantitative or business field (e.g., statistics, mathematics, engineering, computer science) or equivalent experience acquired through accomplishments of applicable knowledge, duties, scope, and skill reflective of the level of this position.
